The warning about text messages from the: IRL" containing the phrase "a friend has complimented you in IRL" being linked to sex trafficking.
The purpose of the app: IRL" is to facilitate sending and receiving invites to hang out with friends in real life.
The app: IRL" only sends text messages to specific contacts in three instances: when an invite is sent, when a contact is added as a friend on the app, or when a friend is nominated for something through the app.
